author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Go to https://ground.news/sabine to get 40% off the Vantage plan and see through sensationalized reporting. Stay fully informed on events around the world with Ground News.

Late last year, the asteroid 2024 YR4 made global headlines as astronomers discovered it had a 1% chance of hitting the Earth in 2032. That chance has since gone to almost zero, but astronomers say there’s now a 4% chance of it hitting the Moon. NASA is now considering two possible options for protecting our moon: deflecting the asteroid, or blowing it up with a nuke. Let’s take a look.

Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.12351

title: NASA Is Considering Nuking An Asteroid To Spare the Moon
